div.p: We received Yesterday Yours of 30 June and in Compliance with your request we invest for you in Note of Jos. Littlejohn & Geo. W. Mansin - dated June 19 th 1852 payath two years after date for - $1350 leaving interest from date to Maturity .6% suy yr 162. $1512. discount .8% pannum (say 344 days, 360 d. per year) . . . 115.57 say Thirteen hundred and Ninty Six 43/100 Dollars $1396.43 to your debit.
The investment we deem perfectly safe - we know of nothing better - The ground alone is worth 2000 $ & the improvements are worth 3th 4000$ -
